content: {A开心}You're inviting me to stay? Thanks! I was just gonna ask if I could move to your Planet. I think it'd be a whole lotta fun to be your neighbor!
{A歪头}Once you've picked a spot for me with the <style=Highlight>Building Kit</style>, I'll move right over. <style=SizeSmall>With a big bag of not-so-well-behaved little pebbles.</style>
Looks like your planet... {A虎啸}still doesn't have a place for me, bhan-rawr~! Maybe go ask the <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> staff?

Then how about you talk to the <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> staff on your planet? I'm gonna start packing! <style=SizeSmall>All those little pebbles... can't leave a single one behind...</style>
{A不好意思}You're inviting me to stay? Thanks for the thought! But let's wait until I've thoroughly checked all the ore deposits all over the place before deciding, bhan!
{A歪头}Once you pick out a place for me, I'll move right over. <style=SizeSmall>With a big ol' bag of troublemaking little pebbles.</style>
